mapper.select: select u.email, u.name, u.birth as birthday, u.sex, u.phone, u.join_date as joinDate, u.email_flag as emailCheck, u.phone_flag as phoneCheck, u.join_type as joinType, c.email_ad_flag as emailAd, c.phone_ad_flag as phoneAd from users as u join customer as c on u.user_id=#{userId} and c.user_id=#{userId}
mapper.update:
update users as u join customer as c on u.user_id=c.user_id
u.name=#{name},
c.email_ad_flag=#{emailAd},
c.phone_ad_flag=#{phoneAd},
where u.user_id=#{userId} and c.user_id=#{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from users where user_id=#{userId} and password=#{password}
